rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern kitchen with stainless steel finishes and integrated appliances; designed in line with local building norms and energy efficiency standards.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: A guest bathroom located near the entrance for convenience, featuring contemporary fixtures and ample storage.
